description: This PHP source file sets locale based on environment variables, serves as a login handler for a web interface, manages user sessions, and contains functions for IP detection, redirection for OAuth, and locale setting. It also includes HTML structure with linked CSS and JavaScript resources for the web UI.

methods.name: innerIP
methods.description: Checks if the client IP is within the internal network by comparing with server network interfaces and environment.

methods.name: get_ips
methods.description: Retrieves IP addresses associated with a specified network interface.

methods.name: if_type
methods.description: Determines the type of network interface (LAN, CM, RG) based on the IP address.

methods.name: create_session
methods.description: Initializes a user session, sets locale, and session parameters such as timeout and login user.

methods.name: getAuthenticationUrl
methods.description: Builds an OAuth authentication URL with specified endpoint and redirect URI.
